comments.body: Quote from: new19980 on June 04, 2023, 05:18:48 PMhello i want to know how can i receive my BTC from exchanges to electrum wallet via lightning networkwhat are the steps that i should do do i have to create a lightning channel on electrum and can irecover the btc spent for opening the channel later and how much are the total fees for opening and closing the lightnging channel since we want to use lightning channel to avoid high btc fees if we gonnaspend more then it doesnt make senseIf you open a LN channel it won't make sense to use it just for one withdrawal because you are likely to pay more fees at the end than if you had requested an on-chain withdrawal. So if the solution is interesting if you have to use LN for other transactions or if you are wiling to make other withdrawals through LN in the coming weeks or months before closing your channel. Once you have open a channel you will need to send funds to the exchange or elsewhere in order to get some receiving capacity, after that you will just need to generate a LN invoice in Electrum with the amount you want to receive(smaller than the receiving capacity of your channel) and paste it on the exchange.
